about_the_game:
Everybody has those weird questions that flicker through our minds once in a while. This outrageously dark comedy sets out to find an answer to the most obvious, frequently asked question of all.

During a mundane laundry day, Randy lets his train of thought run out of control. Once he wonders that fateful 'what if...' he becomes determined to find an answer. His stream of consciousness becomes an epic journey of self-discovery, leading to highs and lows, with some unthinkable surprises along the way.
